data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy S8+ 7.0 Nougat, Windows 10 x64 bit.
data.actual_result: The default role colors appear to be different instead of remaining the same.
data.expected_result: The role colors will remain constant between both platforms
data.short_description: The default role colors on PC are different than the default role colors for Android.
data.steps_to_repro: - On Android Alpha v.3.9.9 (398), choose a color (in this case I used one of the darker colors - View the role color on Canary - Compare results
